November 2016 
 
 
 
Republic of the Union of Myanmar: Equipping Youth 
for Employment Project  
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
This document is an unofficial Myanmar-language translation of the main text of the original 
 
project design document—the Report and Recommendation of the President to the Board of 
 
Directors (RRP)—for the Equipping Youth for Employment Project (EYE). It is intended to 
 
assist in public communication of support expected to be provided under EYE. It is not an 
 
official translation will not be updated to reflect actual implementation progress.  
 
 
 
 
For the Ministry of Education
